mapper.select: SELECT pwd FROM professor WHERE id=#{pid}
SELECT id pid, pwd, name pname FROM professor WHERE id=#{pid}
SELECT s.sseq, s.name subname, d.name dname, s.time FROM subject s, department d, professor p WHERE p.id=#{pid} AND s.name LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%' AND s.id = p.id AND s.dseq = d.dseq ORDER BY s.name

SELECT s.name subname , d.name dname, s.time, p.name pname, s.content, s.location, s.majoryn, s.sseq FROM subject s, department d, professor p WHERE s.sseq = #{sseq} AND s.dseq = d.dseq AND p.id = s.id
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET majoryn=#{majoryn}, name=#{subname}, content=#{content}, time=#{time}, location=#{location} WHERE sseq=#{sseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject (sseq, name, id, time, majoryn, content, dseq, location) VALUES(subject_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subname}, #{pid}, #{time}, #{majoryn}, #{content},#{dseq},#{location})
